page.title: 07SCHOOLS
page.content: All Saints Primary School is a small school in Binfield. There are 89 pupils: 48 boys and 41 girls. The school has 4 classes: Class 1 has 24 children, Class 2 has 25 children and Classes 3 and 4 have 20 children. We start school at 5 years of age and end at 11. The school starts at 9.00 in the morning and ends at 3.15 in the afternoon.In the whole of the school there are 11 rooms. The school operates a cafeteria system at lunchtime and most of the children spend 65p on dinner. We have three playgrounds, one for the infants and two for the juniors. We have 4 sports teams: netball, swimming,football and athletics. We wear a school uniform which is maroon in colour. Most childen say they like their school but would prefer it if it was bigger and more modern.
